title: The Words He Wanted to Hear
description: Sophie has been in love with her best friend Ella's brother for years. Ever since she saw him naked she has thought of nothing but making love to him. But he doesn't even know she exists.Maxwell Van Harkel is a billionaire businessman, who doesn't have time for games. He also has a darkside that Sophie doesn't know exists.When Sophie lies to Max to get her way, she has no idea what she has unleashed and she doesn't understand why Max acts the way that he does."The Words He Wanted To Hear" is the first book in 'The Billionaire's Baby' series. It is an erotic romance full of hot sex. This is a novella with approximately 13,000 words.
author: Helen    Cooper
